5222c31b: The Regulatory Affairs Professionals Network (RAPN) is the organization of professionals involved with regulatory and quality for regulated products, including food, cosmetics, household chemicals, medical devices, pharmaceuticals and biologics, diagnostics, and digital health. RAPN as a neutral, nonprofit organization, RAPN supports and elevates the regulatory profession with education and training, professional standards, publications, research, networking, career development, and other valuable resources.  The society is headquartered in Accra, Ghana, with chapters and affiliates worldwide
